Question: CEA GROUP INTERNATIONAL CO.,LTD. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
CEA GROUP INTERNATIONAL CO.,LTD

CES 2024

- CEA Portable Power Station showcased at CES 2024
- Stylish and portable design with waterproof and dustproof features
- Equipped with LiFePO4 battery cell and self-developed BMS for safety and intelligence
- Offers security functions including overload and short-circuit protections
- Leading technology and innovative products in the outdoor industry
